statements: SELECT * FROM carbon_sequestration_rates
SELECT land_use_type, sequestration_rate FROM carbon_sequestration_rates
SELECT id, land_use_type, measurement_date FROM carbon_sequestration_rates
SELECT * FROM carbon_sequestration_rates ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT land_use_type, sequestration_rate FROM carbon_sequestration_rates WHERE sequestration_rate > 5
SELECT * FROM carbon_sequestration_rates ORDER BY land_use_type DESC, sequestration_rate ASC
SELECT id, land_use_type, sequestration_rate, measurement_date FROM carbon_sequestration_rates WHERE sequestration_rate > 5 ORDER BY measurement_date ASC
SELECT id, land_use_type, AVG(sequestration_rate) AS avg_rate FROM carbon_sequestration_rates GROUP BY land_use_type
SELECT * FROM carbon_sequestration_rates WHERE measurement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY measurement_date DESC
SELECT land_use_type, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM carbon_sequestration_rates GROUP BY land_use_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * FROM Land_Use_Data;
SELECT id, land_type FROM Land_Use_Data;
SELECT area, sequestration_rate FROM Land_Use_Data WHERE sequestration_rate > 0;
SELECT * FROM Carbon_Sequestration WHERE sequestration_amount >= 1000;
SELECT id, land_use_id, sequestration_amount, date_recorded FROM Carbon_Sequestration WHERE date_recorded BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT id, area FROM Land_Use_Data;
SELECT * FROM Land_Use_Data WHERE land_type = 'Forest';
SELECT id, sequestration_amount, date_recorded FROM Carbon_Sequestration WHERE sequestration_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Carbon_Sequestration WHERE date_recorded BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT SUM(sequestration_amount) AS total_sequestration FROM Carbon_Sequestration;
SELECT * FROM carbon_sequestration_rates;
SELECT land_use_category, sequestration_rate FROM carbon_sequestration_rates;
SELECT category_name, description FROM land_use_categories;
SELECT data_id, carbon_content FROM land_use_data;
SELECT * FROM land_use_data WHERE area_in_hectares > 100;
SELECT land_use_id, land_use_category, sequestration_rate FROM carbon_sequestration_rates;
SELECT * FROM carbon_sequestration_rates WHERE land_use_id = 1;
SELECT category_name, description FROM land_use_categories ORDER BY category_id DESC;
SELECT data_id, area_in_hectares, carbon_content FROM land_use_data WHERE carbon_content > 50;
SELECT land_use_id, SUM(sequestration_rate) AS total_sequestration_rate FROM carbon_sequestration_rates GROUP BY land_use_id;
SELECT * FROM carbon_sequestration;
SELECT land_use_category, area_in_acres FROM carbon_sequestration WHERE carbon_sequestration_rate > 0.5;
SELECT city_name FROM urban_data ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT forest_name, tree_species FROM forest_data WHERE tree_age > 50 ORDER BY tree_height DESC;
SELECT farm_name, crop_type, acreage FROM agricultural_data WHERE carbon_content_per_acre < 0.3 ORDER BY acreage;
SELECT forest_name, tree_species, tree_age FROM forest_data;
SELECT crop_type, acreage, carbon_content_per_acre FROM agricultural_data WHERE carbon_content_per_acre > 50;
SELECT city_name, population, green_spaces_area FROM urban_data ORDER BY green_spaces_area DESC;
SELECT land_use_category, area_in_acres, carbon_sequestration_rate FROM carbon_sequestration WHERE carbon_sequestration_rate >= 0.5;
SELECT forest_name, tree_species, tree_age, tree_height FROM forest_data WHERE tree_height < 10;
SELECT * FROM CarbonSequestrationRates;
SELECT id, land_use_type FROM LandUseData ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT land_use_type, factor FROM SequestrationFactors WHERE factor > 0.5;
SELECT id, land_use_type, emissions FROM EmissionsData WHERE emissions < 1000 ORDER BY id LIMIT 5;
SELECT credits, land_use_type FROM CarbonCredits WHERE credits > 50 ORDER BY credits DESC;
SELECT * FROM CarbonSequestrationRates;
SELECT land_use_type, sequestration_rate FROM CarbonSequestrationRates WHERE id = 1;
SELECT land_type, SUM(area) AS total_area FROM LandUseData GROUP BY land_type ORDER BY total_area DESC;
SELECT * FROM SequestrationFactors WHERE factor > 0.5 ORDER BY factor ASC;
SELECT land_use_type, (emissions - credits) AS net_emissions FROM EmissionsData JOIN CarbonCredits ON EmissionsData.land_use_type = CarbonCredits.land_use_type ORDER BY net_emissions DESC;
